# Lightning Fog (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] \[[[Electricity Spells|electricity]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Effect:** Fog spreads in a 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Shining South (WotC), pg. 47

You conjure a smoky cloud that fills the area with small electrical discharges. The smoke obscures all sight as a *[[Fog Cloud (Spell)|fog cloud]]* does. In addition, the discharges deal 1d4 points of electricity damage plus 1 point per caster level (maximum +15) to everything within the cloud on your turn each round.

As with a *[[Fog Cloud (Spell)|fog cloud]]* spell, wind disperses the smoke, and the spell canâ€™t be cast underwater.
